mapper.select: select r.rid, r.uid, r.rfirstname, r.rlastname, c.cplace, c.cid, c.cmoney, c.cimage from reservation r inner join campinfo c on r."cid"=c."cid" where r.uid=#{userId}
mapper.update: update campinfo set ccheck=0 where cid=#{cid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reservation where uid=#{uid}
